00009 #if SLIME_CONSCELL_PACK
00010 typedef struct bidigraph_node_s {
00011   uintptr_t id;
00012 
00013   modref_t* flag[0];
00014   modref_t flag_modref;
00015 
00016   modref_t* edge1[0];
00017   modref_t edge1_modref;
00018 
00019   modref_t* edge2[0];
00020   modref_t edge2_modref;

00025 
00026 typedef struct bidigraph_s {
00027   bidigraph_node_t** nodes;
00028   uintptr_t          nodec;
00029 } bidigraph_t;
00030 
00031 /* Node constructor: Creates a fresh node with given id */
00032 bidigraph_node_t*
00033 Bidigraph_node(uintptr_t id);
00034 
00035 /* Graph constructor: Generates a random binary directed graph with node ids 0...n-1 */
00036 bidigraph_t*
00037 bidigraph_generate(uintptr_t n);
00038 
00039 /* print the binary directed graph as a dot file (see: manpage for dot(1)). */
00040 void bidigraph_print(bidigraph_t* graph, FILE* f);
00041 
00042 /* Create a topological sort of the given graph.  The topsort is
00043    represented by an int modlist, which is written to the given
00044    destination. */
00045 afun bidigraph_topsort(bidigraph_node_t* root, modref_t* dest);
